Hero.subtitle: We design and develop systems, integrations, and automations focused on performance, scalability, and operational clarity.

ProofStrip.title: Real problems. Technical solutions.
ProofStrip.subtitle: We replace manual processes, disconnected systems, and lack of visibility with automation, integration, and control.

automation.description: We automate operational tasks, notifications, routines, and processes that currently consume time and generate human error.

integration.description: We connect systems, platforms, and services so that data flows automatically, securely, and reliably.

dashboard.description: We centralize data in clear dashboards and custom systems for decision-making and operational control.

software.description: We architect and develop complete systems, transforming your idea into a real, scalable product ready to operate.

commissions.title: Commissions
commissions.subtitle: Track your referral commissions
commissions.availableTooltip: The available amount corresponds to your commission on what the client has already paid. Since contracts can be paid in installments, the commission is released as payments are made.
commissions.noCommissionsMessage: When your leads close contracts, your commissions will appear here.
commissions.howItWorksDescription: You earn commission on every contract closed through your referral. The amount available for withdrawal increases as the client makes payments.

entryPrize.title: ENTRY PRIZE
entryPrize.subtitle: Exclusive Welcome Bonus
entryPrize.congratulations: üéâ CONGRATULATIONS! YOU ACHIEVED THE ENTRY CHALLENGE!
entryPrize.modalDescription: We want to reward our new partners who arrive with full focus! The challenge is simple:
entryPrize.step1: Capture qualified leads in your first 30 days on the platform.
entryPrize.step2: If the contracts generated by these leads total $3,000 in commissions for you...
entryPrize.step3: You get a Special Cash Bonus on top of your regular commissions!
entryPrize.note: *Important: What counts is the lead capture date. Even if the contract takes more than 30 days to close, it counts towards the challenge if the lead was created in your first month.

getStarted.title: Partner Manual
getStarted.subtitle: Your complete guide to referring projects

intro.title: The Role of the Commercial Partner
intro.description1: As a commercial partner of Asevedo Company, you act as a strategic bridge between companies with real problems and our specialized engineering team.
intro.description2: Your role is not to sell services, negotiate prices, or execute projects. Your focus is to identify opportunities and direct qualified leads to our team.
intro.mainGoal: Identify a real pain point and guide the lead to Asevedo Company's technical diagnosis.
intro.step2: The responsible engineer performs the diagnosis
intro.step3: The company proposes the solution and budget

services.title: What Types of Problems We Solve
services.description: Understand the types of pain points our team solves. Think about problems, not technology.

automation.title: Process Automation
automation.desc: Repetitive manual work, rework, time-consuming tasks

integration.title: System Integration
integration.desc: Disconnected tools, duplicate data, lack of synchronization

systems.title: Internal Systems
systems.desc: Lack of control, decisions without data, disorganized processes

maintenance.title: Software Maintenance
maintenance.desc: Legacy systems, recurring bugs, lack of technical support

ai.title: Applied AI
ai.desc: Manual data analysis, inaccurate predictions, overloaded customer service

services.tip: Remember: The partner doesn't offer services. They identify problems.

identifying.title: How to Identify a Good Opportunity
identifying.description: Pain points arise in normal conversations, observations, and everyday complaints. Stay alert to the signs.
signs: Frequent errors due to lack of automation
identifying.checklistDesc: If the company has 2 or more of these points, it's a qualified opportunity for referral.
identifying.goldenTipDesc: The better the client, the better the contract, the better your commission.
identifying.goldenTipNote: It's hard to charge a fair price from a small bakery owner earning $1k/month. Look for companies with structure, revenue, and real investment capacity.
identifying.avoidDesc: Micro-enterprises without revenue, informal businesses, those without budget to invest
identifying.seekDesc: Structured SMEs, growing companies, operations with real bottlenecks

process.title: How the Process Works
process.description: You refer, we take care of the rest. Your role ends when the lead schedules the call.
process.nextStep: Next step: Call with the Head of Engineering
process.nextStepDesc: The diagnosis is made directly with the company's technical leadership. This ensures authority, technical precision, and a proposal truly aligned with the client's needs.
process.nextStepNote: Your work is already done. From here, the Asevedo team handles the entire commercial and technical process.

bestPractices.title: Best Approach Practices
doItems: Ask simple questions about the day-to-day
Focus on the problem, not the solution
Let the lead describe their own pain
Direct to the site with your link
dontItems: Try to close the contract yourself

strategies.title: Prospecting Strategies

darkContent.title: Dark Content
darkContent.label: Most scalable strategy
darkContent.desc: Create short videos without showing your face, focusing on triggering the entrepreneur's pain.

strategies.goal: The goal is not to sell, it's to spark interest in the diagnosis.

materials.title: Partner Materials
materials.description: Asevedo Company provides official materials to facilitate your prospecting.
materials.note: Materials will be made available and regularly updated by the company.

cta.title: Ready to Start
cta.description: You now know the partner's strategic role, the simplicity of the process, and the focus on diagnosis and solution.
cta.tip1Desc: Companies with structure and investment capacity
cta.tip2Desc: Leave the diagnosis to the Head of Engineering
cta.tip3Desc: Better client = Better contract = Better earnings
cta.finalTip: The better the pain described by the lead, the better the proposed solution ‚Äî and the greater your return.

bonusRedeemed.note: We received your request and will contact you soon to process the payment.

prizeRedeemed.title: Incredible! üéâ

prizeRedeemed.note: Congratulations, you will receive a special bonus, wait for us to contact you to process the payment!
